name: Eric Harris Doom WADs
description: The Columbine High School shooting occurred on April 20th, 1999, and killed 13 people while injuring many more. The two perpetrators were two seniors, Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold. Before the shootings occurred, Harris, an avid player of the video game Doom, was known to a few to create various Doom WADs (WAD being the default package of files for the game). There were numerous WADs he shared with his friends, including THRASHER.WAD, REALDETH.WAD, and more.
